Boost Log Library Documentation

Version 1.4

Viewing

As a lot of information gets written into logs, it becomes harder and harder to view/analyze them - in case an error appears. However, I recommend this tool (Windows Only): it allows for easy filtering of logs - you can can extract only what interests you.

Note [28 Oct '04] I have not updated the EasyLogViewer for quite a while. I will do it as soon as I have some spare time - but it might still take a few months until then.
